scripts.install-latest: npm install babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babelify browserify node-sass react react-dom uglify-js watchify --save-dev
scripts.install-local: npm install babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babelify react react-dom --save-dev
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.js -t babelify | uglifyjs -mc > public/js/script.min.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.dev: npm run watch & browser-sync start --server public --files "public/js/*.js, public/css/*.css" --index index.html --browser "google chrome"
